slides.title: Time and Distance
slides.content:
**Basic Formula:** Speed = Distance/Time
**Units:** km/h, m/s
**Conversion:** 1 km/h = 5/18 m/s
**Average Speed:** Total Distance/Total Time

slides.title: Time and Work
slides.content:
**Work Formula:** Work = Time ร Efficiency
**If A can do work in n days:** A's 1 day work = 1/n
**Together:** If A does in x days, B in y days, together = 1/(1/x + 1/y)

question.questionText: A car travels 120 km in 2 hours. What is its speed?
question.explanation: Speed = Distance/Time = 120 km รท 2 hours = 60 km/h
